title: Delta Lake
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has the required Delta Lake version
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_delta; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } const apiOutput = clusterStep.data; try { const minDeltaVersion = variables.iq_104_3_min_delta_version || '2.4'; if (!apiOutput.spark_version) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Spark version information not available', code: 'NO_SPARK_VERSION', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } const sparkVersion = apiOutput.spark_version; const deltaMatch = sparkVersion.match(/Delta (\d+\.\d+)/i); if (deltaMatch) { const deltaVersion = deltaMatch[1]; if (parseFloat(deltaVersion) >= parseFloat(minDeltaVersion)) { return { status: 'pass', message: `Cluster has required Delta Lake version (${sparkVersion})`, code: 'VALID_DELTA_VERSION', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: `Delta Lake version ${deltaVersion} does not meet minimum requirement of ${minDeltaVersion}`, code: 'OUTDATED_DELTA_VERSION', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Delta Lake version not found in spark version: ' + sparkVersion, code: 'NO_DELTA_VERSION', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } } catch (error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Error processing Delta Lake version data: ' + error.message, code: 'PROCESSING_ERROR', test_id: 'IQ-104-3', title: 'Delta Lake' }; } }
